title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.11 - Use of terminal may be denied persons violating law or rules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.11 - Use of terminal may be denied persons violating law or rules

State Regulations

The superintendent of the terminal shall have authority
to deny the use of the terminal to any individual violating Port Authority
rules and regulations or laws, ordinances or regulations of the United States
government, the State of New York, or the City of New York. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1220.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
